definition: (bird species of China) purple sunbird (Cinnyris asiaticus)

sentences.english: Hence, this road is also known as the Path of Lilac.
sentences.chinese: 因此，这条路也被称为路径的淡紫色。

sentences.english: The last segment, in purple, is the Stack.
sentences.chinese: 最后一个紫色的段是堆栈。

sentences.english: It is the emblematic red grape of Argentinean. Pleasant aroma to raspberries, cherries and plums with intense purple color.
sentences.chinese: 果香怡人，树莓，樱桃和李子的芬芳浓郁，呈酱紫色。

sentences.english: Tiny purple fish swirl around them.
sentences.chinese: 紫色的小鱼在他们的身边打着旋儿。

sentences.english: For your purple soul in Acheron.
sentences.chinese: 呈给你黄土下紫色的灵魂。

sentences.english: There was a rich man who was clothed in purple and fine linen and who feasted sumptuously every day.
sentences.chinese: 有一个财主穿著紫色袍和细麻布衣服，天天奢华宴乐。

sentences.english: But birds have an extra cone for seeing violet and ultraviolet light.
sentences.chinese: 但是鸟类多了一种锥体，能识别紫色光和紫外线。

sentences.english: Then, the characteristic components of purple tealeaf were studied.
sentences.chinese: 论文进一步研究茶树紫色芽叶内含成分的特征。

sentences.english: Put some violet in your life.
Purple can go with all most any color.
sentences.chinese: 紫色几乎能与任何颜色搭配。

sentences.english: It also facilitates your fitting and matching, while firefly purple highlights your extraordinary personality.
sentences.chinese: 萤紫色则彰显鲜明的个性情调。

sentences.english: The places you have visited are marked in bright purple on the map of the world .
sentences.chinese: 你去过的地方将会在世界地图上用亮紫色标出来。

sentences.english: Just outside the port-hole and very close to his head bloomed many purple lilies.
sentences.chinese: 在船边，离他头很近，开着几朵紫色的水莲。

sentences.english: Some of these give a bluish or purplish tinge to the light.
sentences.chinese: 其中的一些让蓝或紫色色调的光线。

sentences.english: Purple Soil distributed widely in China, especially in upper reaches of the Yangtze River.
sentences.chinese: 紫色土在我国分布较广，特别是长江上游地区。
